derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from modern Latin saccharum 'sugar'+ -in

entry.tran: (尤指减肥时代替食糖使用的)糖精
entry.def: Saccharin is a very sweet chemical substance that some people use instead of sugar, especially when they are trying to lose weight.

means.word_mean: 1. a crystalline substance 500 times sweeter than sugar; used as a calorie-free sweetener
